assimp
License: BSD license.
http://assimp.sourceforge.net/

libpng
License: libpng
http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html

SDL
License: zlib license
http://www.libsdl.org/

SDL_image
License: zlib license
https://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_image/
Note: SDL_image uses JPEG 9d, libpng, libwebp, tiff, zlib. I checked all those libraries are zlib like. Correct me if I am wrong.

freetype2
License: The FreeType License (FTL) is the most commonly used one. It is a BSD-style license
http://www.freetype.org/

bullet
License: zlib license
http://bulletphysics.org/wordpress/

eigen
License: MPL2, which is a simple weak copyleft license
http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/index.php?title=Main_Page

ttf-droid
License: Apache
http://code.google.com/android/
ftp://ftp.archlinux.org/other/community/ttf-droid/ttf-droid-20121017.tar.xz

dejavu-fonts(ttf)
License: Bitstream Vera Fonts Copyright 
http://dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/Main_Page
